channel.title: OpenFoundry - Recently Added Listings - 一般資訊

item.title: OpenESB
item.description: OpenESB is an open source platform solution for business integration, enterprise application integration, and SOA. It is licensed under CDDL.
item.author: chkche1

item.title: Apache Software Foundation
item.description: The Apache Software Foundation provides support for the Apache community of open-source software projects. The Apache projects are characterized by a collaborative, consensus based development process, an open and pragmatic software license, and a desire to create high quality software that leads the way in its field.
item.author: chkche1

item.title: WfMC (Workflow Managment Coalition)
item.description: The Workflow Management Coalition (WfMC) is a global organization of adopters, developers, consultants, analysts, as well as university and research groups engaged in workflow and BPM. The WfMC creates and contributes to process related standards, educates the market on related issues, and is the only standards organization that concentrates purely on process.
item.author: chkche1

item.title: Bitpipe
item.description: Bitpipe.com is the enterprise IT professional's guide to information technology resources.
item.author: chkche1

item.title: OMG (Object Management Group)
item.description: Object Management Group (OMG) is a consortium, originally aimed at setting standards for distributed object-oriented systems, and is now focused on modeling (programs, systems and business processes) and model-based standards.
item.author: chkche1

item.title: OpenSymphony
item.description: OpenSymphony is a Java open source project (license) designed to provide application developers with a suite of components for rapid development of enterprise class Java applications. These components are loosely coupled, allowing the application developer to use one or more of them in a single application (along with other 3rd party or custom components).
item.author: chkche1

item.title: OW2
item.description: OW2 is a global open-source software community which goal is the development of open-source distributed middleware, in the form of flexible and adaptable components. These components range from specific software frameworks and protocols to integrated platforms. OW2 developments follow a component-based approach.
item.author: chkche1

item.title: JBoss
item.description: JBoss , by Red Hat, is the leader in enterprise-class open source middleware. JBoss Enterprise Middleware is comprised of certified, supported platform and framework distributions that are based on JBoss Community projects.
item.author: chkche1
